memories.title: Voice Rules (Critical)
memories.content:
- No em-dashes ever (use ellipses or arrows)
- No quotation marks ever (write phrases directly, e.g. git push not "git push")
- No authority signaling ("the uncomfortable truth", "let me be clear")
